author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Several misprints and improvements are added, which are useful for debugging. This should not affect any result.

Particles directed to the beam pipe are no checked anymore by eta and momentum cuts. This is needed for PPS simulation and will not affect central detector simulation

#### PR validation:
private

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
no
title: Improved info printouts for simulation
